channel.title: [377] Project 377 [Duh]
channel.description:
[center][b]Introduction[/b] [hr] Simply put, a remake of the 377 revision. There's not much more to say is there? [hr] [b]Team Members[/b] [hr] [i]Lead Developer[/i] - LilXCJ (Corey) [i]Client Developer[/i] - Cocoa (Cocoa) [i]Webmaster[/i] - Acans (Acans) Note: (name) = Forum name [hr] [b]Source[/b] [hr] iClarity v1.05 (Cleaned BlazeScape Reborn) [hr] [b]Features[/b] [hr] Actual (or similar) NPC spawns of RuneScape. 31.5x RuneScape Combat Rate. 3x RuneScape Skilling Rate. Opening and closing doors. Walking through doors 70% Prayer + Draining 90% Fletching 99% Smithing 90% Fishing 20% Thieving 90% Slayer 100% Woodcutting 90% Firemaking 99% Fletching 90% Cooking 100% Mining 20% Crafting 90% Runecrafting NPC Clipping [hr] [b]Updates[/b] [hr]
1. (Corey) - Removed Custom quest interface sendquests. 2. (Corey) - Removed Christmas and Easter event Dialogues, ect. 3. (Corey) + Added Npc Clipping. (Monsters cannot follow you past walls, ect.) 4. (Corey) + Added RuneScape Guide NPC + Walking in set area. 5. (Corey) ! Working on a walkThroughDoor method 6. (Corey) ! Changed welcome message to "Welcome to Project 377" 7. (Corey) + Added Door opening to Survival Expert after RuneScape Guide 8. (Corey) ! Leaving a backup of the BlazeScape Client with everything from RC4 V1.0 9. (Corey) ! Planning on changing client bases, re-add music, skillcapes, and music only. 10. (Corey) + Added 1st set of Dialogue to Tutorial Island 11. (Corey) ! Changed Starting area to Tutorial Island 12. (Corey) - Removed Useless Commands 13. (Corey) - Removed all NPC's 14. (Corey) - Removed Useless Dialogue 15. (Corey) - Removed BlazeScape's NPC drops 16. (Corey) - Removed High Scores (ingame) 17. (Corey) - Removed Custom Object Teleports 18. (Corey) - Removed Previous Fishing that was handled in clientHandler.java instead of Fishing.java (that I created) 19. (Corey) - Removed Warriors Guild (Back-up is made) 20. (Corey) - Removed Warriors Guild Map Loading Cue 21. (Corey) ! Changed Blackscreen coordinates to Lumbridge. 22. (Corey) ! No need to ::blackscreen anymore. Automatically sent to Lumbridge. 23. (Corey) - Reyx7's Book is removed. 24. (Corey) + Created a package folder for Quests 25. (Corey) + Created a Tutorial Island Class inside the Quests folder to handle Tutorial Island 26. (Corey) + Grouped sets of object IDs for opening doors/gates. 27. (Corey) + Opening a gate opens both sides of the gate. Instead of one. 28. (Corey) ! Planning on working on door/gate closing. 29. (Corey) + Completed Tutorial Island up to Quest Guide 30. (Corey) + Begun adding support for cooking almost all items. 31. (Corey) + Tutorial Progress Saves 32. (Corey) + Started on Combat Instructor. 33. (Corey) + Started on Mining/Smithing Instructor. 34. (Corey) + Added Mining Instructor Dialogue 35. (Corey) + Added Combat Instructor Dialogue 36. (Corey) + Rat spawns 37. (Corey) + Banker Dialogue 38. (Corey) + Financial Advisor Dialogue 39. (Corey) + Monk+Prayer Dialogue 40. (Corey) ! Working on fixing chathead emotes. 41. (Corey) + Working on a Smithing class. 42. (Corey) + Full Smithing added 43. (Corey) + Working on Smelting class. 45. (Corey) + Completed Mining Instructor Dialogue 46. (Corey) + Can now advance past Mining Instructor 47. (Corey) ! Cleaned out some bugs with Smithing + Smelting 48. (Corey) + Added some object IDs for Mining 49. (Corey) + Spawned Vannaka (Combat Instructor) 50. (Corey) + Rats NPC emotes added. 51. (Corey) ! Rats Att + Def levels adjusted. 52. (Corey) + Walking through doors works (Open door, walk through, door closes) 53. (Corey) + Discovered a way to alter skill-level up interfaces to make them more realistic. 54. (Corey) + Combat Instructor dialogue completed. 55. (Corey) ! ForceWalk method bug fixed. 56. (Corey) ! Combat EXP rates changed from * 12.5 (50XP * Hit) to * 31.25 (125XP * hit) 57. (Corey) + Added Support for talking to bankers via objects. 58. (Corey) + Made Banker + Financial Advisor optional. 59. (Corey) + Bank now says "The Bank of Project 377". 60. (Corey) + Logout nows says "Project 377" instead of "Blazescape" 61. (Corey) + Support for Quest points. 62. (Corey) + Combat Instructor can now be completed. 63. (Corey) ! Client GFrame reverted back to 317. 64. (Corey) ! Moved Sideicons back in place. 65. (Corey) ! Fixed up Public Chat/Private/Report Abuse Button area. 66. (Corey) ! Gameframe updated to 377. (This was done on my client.) 67. (Corey) ! Icons (backpack) reverted to 317. (My client) 68. (Corey) + Created 3 different background, title boxes, and title buttons. (There will be a poll later.) 69. (Corey) ! Changed "He gave you such and such" interfaces to show the item you are recieving. 70. (Corey) ! Going to re-write Fishing. AGAIN 71. (Corey) + Added Brother Brace (Prayer + Social Guide) Dialogue. 72. (Corey) ! Fixed 'walk through door method' bug where I discovered it causing lag. 73. (Corey) ! Fixed firemaking timers, where it would burn for a few seconds then die. It now burns for a more reasonable amount of time. (Time varies by log type.) 74. (Corey) + Added Fishing spot for survival expert. Can now advance from Beginning - Brother Brace. 75. (Corey) ! Will make Brother Brace also optional. 76. (Corey) + Brother Bruce is now optional. 77. (Corey) + Added Magic Instructor and Chicken Spawns. 78. (Corey) + Writing up a method for itemspawns 79. (Corey) ! Possibly going to write itemSpawns like NpcSpawns. 80. (Corey) + Tutorial Island Complete. 81. (Corey) + Tutorial Island is optional for more experienced players. 82. (Corey) + Lumbridge Spawns 83. (Zac) + Falador Spawns 84. (Corey) + Al-Kharid Border Guard Spawns 85. (Corey) + Reserved sections for cows, chickens, sheep, goblins. 86. (Corey) + New command that allows for permanent npc spawning for faster progress. 87. (Corey) + Lumbridge Spawns 90% 88. (Corey) ! If your smithing level is not high enough, the text for the item is red. If it is, it is white. 89. (Corey) + More NPC Spawns 90. (Corey) ! Completing tutorial saves to your character. A few bugs involving not saving were identified.
[hr] Media (Pictures and Videos) [hr] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wWbNWcPmhfo http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LCr7pfHmQCc [IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg159/Ituharu_Yamada/welcome.jpg[/img] [/center] P.S. Flame me moar for doing a "remake". Lul.

item.title: [377] Project 377 [Duh]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[center]Introduction
[hr]
Simply put, a remake of the 377 revision. There’s not much more to say is there?

[hr]
Team Members
[hr]
Lead Developer - LilXCJ (Corey)
Client Developer - Cocoa (Cocoa)
Webmaster - Acans (Acans)
Note: (name) = Forum name

[hr]
Source
[hr]
iClarity v1.05 (Cleaned BlazeScape Reborn)

[hr]
Features
[hr]
Actual (or similar) NPC spawns of RuneScape.
31.5x RuneScape Combat Rate.
3x RuneScape Skilling Rate.
Opening and closing doors.
Walking through doors
70% Prayer + Draining
90% Fletching
99% Smithing
90% Fishing
20% Thieving
90% Slayer
100% Woodcutting
90% Firemaking
99% Fletching
90% Cooking
100% Mining
20% Crafting
90% Runecrafting

NPC Clipping

[hr]
Updates
[hr]

1. (Corey) - Removed Custom quest interface sendquests. 2. (Corey) - Removed Christmas and Easter event Dialogues, ect. 3. (Corey) + Added Npc Clipping. (Monsters cannot follow you past walls, ect.) 4. (Corey) + Added RuneScape Guide NPC + Walking in set area. 5. (Corey) ! Working on a walkThroughDoor method 6. (Corey) ! Changed welcome message to "Welcome to Project 377" 7. (Corey) + Added Door opening to Survival Expert after RuneScape Guide 8. (Corey) ! Leaving a backup of the BlazeScape Client with everything from RC4 V1.0 9. (Corey) ! Planning on changing client bases, re-add music, skillcapes, and music only. 10. (Corey) + Added 1st set of Dialogue to Tutorial Island 11. (Corey) ! Changed Starting area to Tutorial Island 12. (Corey) - Removed Useless Commands 13. (Corey) - Removed all NPC's 14. (Corey) - Removed Useless Dialogue 15. (Corey) - Removed BlazeScape's NPC drops 16. (Corey) - Removed High Scores (ingame) 17. (Corey) - Removed Custom Object Teleports 18. (Corey) - Removed Previous Fishing that was handled in clientHandler.java instead of Fishing.java (that I created) 19. (Corey) - Removed Warriors Guild (Back-up is made) 20. (Corey) - Removed Warriors Guild Map Loading Cue 21. (Corey) ! Changed Blackscreen coordinates to Lumbridge. 22. (Corey) ! No need to ::blackscreen anymore. Automatically sent to Lumbridge. 23. (Corey) - Reyx7's Book is removed. 24. (Corey) + Created a package folder for Quests 25. (Corey) + Created a Tutorial Island Class inside the Quests folder to handle Tutorial Island 26. (Corey) + Grouped sets of object IDs for opening doors/gates. 27. (Corey) + Opening a gate opens both sides of the gate. Instead of one. 28. (Corey) ! Planning on working on door/gate closing. 29. (Corey) + Completed Tutorial Island up to Quest Guide 30. (Corey) + Begun adding support for cooking almost all items. 31. (Corey) + Tutorial Progress Saves 32. (Corey) + Started on Combat Instructor. 33. (Corey) + Started on Mining/Smithing Instructor. 34. (Corey) + Added Mining Instructor Dialogue 35. (Corey) + Added Combat Instructor Dialogue 36. (Corey) + Rat spawns 37. (Corey) + Banker Dialogue 38. (Corey) + Financial Advisor Dialogue 39. (Corey) + Monk+Prayer Dialogue 40. (Corey) ! Working on fixing chathead emotes. 41. (Corey) + Working on a Smithing class. 42. (Corey) + Full Smithing added 43. (Corey) + Working on Smelting class. 45. (Corey) + Completed Mining Instructor Dialogue 46. (Corey) + Can now advance past Mining Instructor 47. (Corey) ! Cleaned out some bugs with Smithing + Smelting 48. (Corey) + Added some object IDs for Mining 49. (Corey) + Spawned Vannaka (Combat Instructor) 50. (Corey) + Rats NPC emotes added. 51. (Corey) ! Rats Att + Def levels adjusted. 52. (Corey) + Walking through doors works (Open door, walk through, door closes) 53. (Corey) + Discovered a way to alter skill-level up interfaces to make them more realistic. 54. (Corey) + Combat Instructor dialogue completed. 55. (Corey) ! ForceWalk method bug fixed. 56. (Corey) ! Combat EXP rates changed from * 12.5 (50XP * Hit) to * 31.25 (125XP * hit) 57. (Corey) + Added Support for talking to bankers via objects. 58. (Corey) + Made Banker + Financial Advisor optional. 59. (Corey) + Bank now says "The Bank of Project 377". 60. (Corey) + Logout nows says "Project 377" instead of "Blazescape" 61. (Corey) + Support for Quest points. 62. (Corey) + Combat Instructor can now be completed. 63. (Corey) ! Client GFrame reverted back to 317. 64. (Corey) ! Moved Sideicons back in place. 65. (Corey) ! Fixed up Public Chat/Private/Report Abuse Button area. 66. (Corey) ! Gameframe updated to 377. (This was done on my client.) 67. (Corey) ! Icons (backpack) reverted to 317. (My client) 68. (Corey) + Created 3 different background, title boxes, and title buttons. (There will be a poll later.) 69. (Corey) ! Changed "He gave you such and such" interfaces to show the item you are recieving. 70. (Corey) ! Going to re-write Fishing. AGAIN 71. (Corey) + Added Brother Brace (Prayer + Social Guide) Dialogue. 72. (Corey) ! Fixed 'walk through door method' bug where I discovered it causing lag. 73. (Corey) ! Fixed firemaking timers, where it would burn for a few seconds then die. It now burns for a more reasonable amount of time. (Time varies by log type.) 74. (Corey) + Added Fishing spot for survival expert. Can now advance from Beginning - Brother Brace. 75. (Corey) ! Will make Brother Brace also optional. 76. (Corey) + Brother Bruce is now optional. 77. (Corey) + Added Magic Instructor and Chicken Spawns. 78. (Corey) + Writing up a method for itemspawns 79. (Corey) ! Possibly going to write itemSpawns like NpcSpawns. 80. (Corey) + Tutorial Island Complete. 81. (Corey) + Tutorial Island is optional for more experienced players. 82. (Corey) + Lumbridge Spawns 83. (Zac) + Falador Spawns 84. (Corey) + Al-Kharid Border Guard Spawns 85. (Corey) + Reserved sections for cows, chickens, sheep, goblins. 86. (Corey) + New command that allows for permanent npc spawning for faster progress. 87. (Corey) + Lumbridge Spawns 90% 88. (Corey) ! If your smithing level is not high enough, the text for the item is red. If it is, it is white. 89. (Corey) + More NPC Spawns 90. (Corey) ! Completing tutorial saves to your character. A few bugs involving not saving were identified.

[hr]
Media (Pictures and Videos)
[hr]



welcome.jpg773×555

[/center]

P.S. Flame me moar for doing a “remake”. Lul.
